alert.note: Alert for Banks; Barrow; Clarke; Gwinnett; Hall; Jackson; Oconee; Rockdale; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 6:45PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Rockdale, central Oconee, Barrow, western Morgan, eastern Gwinnett, Banks, northwestern Clarke, Walton, central Hall, Jackson and Newton Counties through 730 PM EST ... At 645 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Gainesville to Oak Hill, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Conyers, Winder, Monroe, Covington, Jefferson, Commerce, Madison, Watkinsville, Homer, Snellville, Loganville, Braselton, Auburn, Flowery Branch, Dacula, Social Circle, Oakwood, Lula, and Grayson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Banks; Barrow; Clarke; Gwinnett; Hall; Jackson; Oconee; Rockdale; Walton
